articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Wonsan Shoes Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Wonsan Shoes Factory
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Wonsan Shoes Factory.
					 He went round a room dedicated to the history of the factory and a newly-built room for education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 Seeing with keen interest data on the development of the factory, he noted that the factory is associated with the warm love of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who had dedicated all their life to the people, regarding it as their motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 He said it is needed to conduct among the employees the effective education in various forms and ways through those rooms so that they may discharge their duty more creditably with the pride of working at the factory associated with history of the great leaders.
					
					 Then he toured the design room, injection-molding workteam, shoe-making shop and other places of the factory to learn in detail about the production and quality of products.
					
					 He said he was very pleased to see shoes made at the factory with domestic vinyl chloride and synthetic leather from the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory.
					
					 Its shoes are diverse and smart in shape and light in weight, he noted, saying with high appreciation that the factory has made strides in the implementation of the Party's policy of producing diverse, multicolored and light shoes and ensuring their durability.
					
					 He urged the factory to conduct a vigorous drive for producing more and better shoes to suit the tastes, sense of beauty and physical and mental qualities of people according to their ages and seasonal demand.
					
					 He is very pleased to see the factory making steady innovation and progress, he said, adding that what Kim Jong Il had desired in his lifetime is to run the factories conducive to the welfare of the people in full capacity and thus make them benefit from them.
					
					 The officials and employees of the Wonsan Shoes Factory are good at production and culture as befitting a unit associated with the leadership feats of the Party and a factory which raised before others the banner of modernization in the light industrial sector, he noted, stressing the need for all other factories and enterprises to learn from their working spirit and manner.
					
					 He showed deep benevolence for the officials and employees of the factory.
					
					 Accompanying him were Jo Yong Won and Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Working-level Contact for Talks between Authorities of North and South of Korea Held
articles.content:
Working-level Contact for Talks between Authorities of North and South of Korea Held
 Panmunjom, November 27 (KCNA) -- A working-level contact for the talks between authorities of the north and the south of Korea took place at the Thongil House in the north side of Panmunjom Thursday.
					 The both sides thrashed out the practical issues arising in holding talks between authorities of the north and the south and made public a joint press release.
					
					 They decided to hold the first talks between authorities of the north and the south in Kaesong Industrial Zone on December 11 and discuss the pending issues for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Mauritania
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Mauritania
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz, president of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania, on Friday on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message sincerely wished the friendly people of Mauritania progress and development, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger by mutual efforts.

articles.title: CPRK Blames Yonhap News for Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Blames Yonhap News for Smear Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- On Nov. 25, Yonhap News of south Korea reported that the north is pursuing a "policy of horror and dictatorial policy," unspeakable invectives, referring to the contents of the press release which had been opened to public ahead of an "academic symposium" to be held by the "National Institute for Security Strategy Studies".  
					 The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued a statement on Friday in this regard:
					
					 This is not only an intolerable insult to the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership but a grave politically-motivated provocation aimed at plunging the inter-Korean relations into catastrophe.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that this false propaganda is being openly conducted under the wire-pulling of the south Korean authorities behind the scene, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The misinformation spread by Yonhap News was provided by the Intelligence Service and the above-said institute that faked up the groundless paper on the basis of such lies is an anti-DPRK plot-breeding organ under the IS. 
					
					 The false propaganda is timed to coincide with the working-level contact which is slated to take place for the talks between authorities of the north and the south. This self-exposes that the south Korean authorities have no idea of mending the inter-Korean relations through dialogue.
					
					 All facts clearly show that the south Korean authorities have the black-hearted intention to keep stand off with the north to the last though they try to give impression they are interested in dialogue. 
					
					 Explicitly speaking, it is the steadfast stand and will of the DPRK that it is hard to settle any matter with those seeking to do harm to the dignity of its supreme leadership.

articles.title: DPRK Youth League Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Youth League Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Jong Yong Won, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, came back home on Friday after taking part in the 19th Congress of the World Federation of Democratic Youth that was held in Cuba, and after visiting Venezuela.

articles.title: Japanese Buddhist Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Japanese Buddhist Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- A Japanese Buddhist delegation with Ryoko Nishioka, priest of Enman Temple and former executive secretary general of Tendai Religion, as its head and Raitei Arima, director general of Kyoto Buddhist Society of Japan, as its honorary head left here for home Friday.

articles.title: Thai Businessmen Leave
articles.content:
Thai Businessmen Leave
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Tit Shan Sandy Cheng, chairman of Thai Loxpac Co. Ltd., and his party left here for home Friday.

articles.title: 4th National Conference of Chairpersons of Exemplary Primary Organizations of GFTUK Held
articles.content:
4th National Conference of Chairpersons of Exemplary Primary Organizations of GFTUK Held
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The 4th national conference of chairpersons of exemplary primary organizations of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea took place here on Friday.
					 The conference held on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the union analyzed and reviewed successes and experience gained in the work of the primary organizations in the past and discussed the tasks and ways for further firmly consolidating the GFTUK to be militant organization devotedly defending Marshal Kim Jong Un, true to his idea and leadership.
					
					 Present at the conference were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, chairpersons of exemplary primary organizations and officials of the trade unions in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, said in his report made at the conference that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il attached great importance to strengthening its primary organizations in the whole period of leading the revolution and wisely led them to enhance their functions and roles.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung provided the precious tradition of building the working class' mass political organization in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, founded the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea on Nov. 30, Juche 34 (1945) and established a well-organized working system from its central committee to primary organizations.
					
					 Kim Jong Il clarified with lucidity the basic mission of the primary organizations of the GFTUK when he was conducting his revolutionary activities among workers at the Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory and Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory.
					
					 The Juche-oriented idea of the great leaders on the trade union-building and their exploits are being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un at a fresh higher level.
					
					 He called upon all primary organizations and their members to remain loyal to the leadership of Kim Jong Un while holding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of Juche forever.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers underscored the need for further strengthening the primary organizations to let all members of the trade unions turn out in an all-out onward movement for greeting the 7th Congress of the WPK with high political enthusiasm and unprecedented labor successes.

articles.title: Lao Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Lao Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday on the occasion of the 40th founding anniversary of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association, other officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and representatives of the international bodies.
					
					 Staff members of the Lao embassy were present at the reception.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Plant Trees in Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Plant Trees in Kumsusan Palace of Sun 
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and agricultural workers across the country planted trees in the Arboretum of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday. 
					 During the past period, officials of the Central Committee of the union, officials of the union and agricultural workers in Pyongyang City, Yonthan, Phyongwon, Nyongbyon, Cholsan, Hwangju County and other counties planted a lot of trees around the sacred temple of Juche where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 This time they planted hundreds of evergreen tall trees of nine species and rare flower shrubs in the area around the temple.
					
					 Agricultural workers planted trees with their pure loyalty.
					
					 On Friday they presented more than 4,000 trees of dozens of species and many flower roots and seeds and dedicated more than 2,000 tools of nine sorts for management to the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site.

articles.title: Songs Instilling Spirit of Revolutionary Forerunners
articles.content:
Songs Instilling Spirit of Revolutionary Forerunners
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Young people in the DPRK have turned out as one in the drive for greeting the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) with high political enthusiasm and unprecedented labor achievements.
					 In this drive, a number of songs are playing a great role in encouraging them to perform great feats in different fields of socialist construction.
					
					 Typical of them are "On the Road of Fighting together with the General", "A Soldier's Wish" and "The General Is the Destiny of Korea", theme songs of feature films created before and after the 6th Congress of the WPK (1980).
					
					 Those songs are run through with the indomitable faith of the anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs who unconditionally and fully carried out the lines and policies advanced by President Kim Il Sung and defended him at the cost of their lives with absolute trust in him.
					
					 Jong Kwang Chol, a student of Kim Il Sung University, said that the songs inspire all the people with the fresh will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche in the spirit of Paektu.
					
					 Kim Un Hye, a worker of the Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326, said the songs are encouraging all the young people in the DPRK to live and work in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu and perform great feats in the production to greet the 7th Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes Jagang Province
articles.content:
Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes Jagang Province
 Kanggye, November 27 (KCNA) -- Loyal members of the relay group of young vanguard passed Jagang Province.
					 They arrived at Ryongrim County, Jagang Province on Nov. 22.
					
					 Ri Hyong Gun, chairman of the Jagang Provincial People's Committee, Ham Chang Son, secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, people from all walks of life and youth and students greeted them.
					
					 Members of the relay group of young vanguard in Jagang Province who took over the red flag laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Kanggye City, Huichon City and Jonchon County and mosaics depicting them in Ryongrim and Songwon counties and paid homage to them. 
					
					 They arrived in Jonchon County where they enjoyed an art performance given by art circle members and took part in the youth and students' meeting of reciting poems and singing songs held at the "1,000-ri Journey for National Liberation" Schoolchildren's Palace.
					
					 Nov. 24, they took part in a meeting of young vanguard in Jagang Province.
					
					 They visited the Revolutionary Site in Mt. Jangja where Kim Jong Il cultivated the patriotic intention while wishing the President good health during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 They went round a house where Kim Jong Il lodged, two pine-nut trees, study site and wrestling site.
					
					 They also visited the Huichon Revolutionary Museum and the Huichon Silk Mill.
					
					 They conducted held a meeting with participants in the 2nd national meeting of young front-rankers in noble traits, oratorical meeting and campfire gathering.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Independence, Songun and Socialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Independence, Songun and Socialism
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- If a country is weak in its independent stand, it is impossible to resolutely repulse outside forces' high-handed and arbitrary practices and defend the gains of the revolution to the last under the situation where the imperialists persist in their interference in other countries'  internal affairs, pressure and aggression, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 This has proved to be an immutable truth on the road of independence, Songun and socialism being covered by the army and people of the DPRK under the leadership of the great party.
					
					 Independence is what keeps dignified Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea alive.
					
					 Thanks to the principle of independence consistently adhered to in the whole course of the revolution, the DPRK could emerge victorious in the two revolutionary wars, social revolution of two stages and socialist construction while frustrating the counterrevolutionary offensive of imperialists and reactionaries and the interference of left- and right-wing opportunists.
					
					 It is impossible to win the struggle against the imperialists and defend the party and the state and people's security without one's own strength and strong military muscle for self-defence. This is the hard reality.
					
					 It is our party's philosophy on arms that an army should be countered with armed forces and the victory of the revolution be guaranteed by the army. Its validity was clearly proved through the fierce DPRK-U.S. nuclear stand-off which started from the 1990s.
					
					 All the Korean people are united close around their leader in thinking and purpose, morality and sense of obligation and the whole society formed a large family in which all its members help and lead each other along in a comradely way. This is the essential nature of Korean-style socialism and source of inexhaustible strength.
					
					 Defending socialism means a victory and giving it up means death. 
					
					 The DPRK is highly dignified for its independence, emerges victorious thanks to the Songun politics and is demonstrating its might under the banner of socialism. It is the beacon of hope for the world people aspiring after independence and the banner of victory.

articles.title: Providing Peaceful Climate on Korean Peninsula Is Urgent National Task: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Providing Peaceful Climate on Korean Peninsula Is Urgent National Task: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Defusing the danger of a war and tension on the Korean Peninsula and creating a peaceful climate is a vital issue related to the destiny of the nation and the future of the inter-Korean relations, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Nothing is dearer to the Korean nation than peace. 
					
					 It is the steadfast stand and will of the DPRK to defuse the tension and achieve lasting peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK urged the south Korean authorities to stop all war moves including their reckless military drills being staged with outside forces and opt for defusing the tension and creating a peaceful climate on the peninsula at the outset of this year. Then it also took exceptional measures to defuse the tension and preserve the peace. 
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities did not stop the joint military drills with outside forces despite the DPRK's noble patriotic measures for creating a peaceful climate. On the contrary, they escalated them.
					
					 It is an unpardonable act of treachery for them to tighten the collusion and nexus with the U.S. desperately pursuing its hostile policy toward the DPRK and stepping up the moves for invading the north to meet its aggressive interests in disregard of the destiny of the Korean nation. 
					
					 It is an urgent national task to defuse the danger of war and provide peaceful environment on the peninsula.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of all the Koreans to pave the way for peace and reunification by their concerted efforts without letting the north and the south fight each other. 
					
					 The joint military drills with outside forces should be stopped in south Korea and lasting peace should settle on the peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should drop their daggers for confrontation and war hidden behind their belts and make a switchover to defuse tension and create a peaceful climate on the peninsula.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Chief Executive's Solicitation of Cooperation in Nuclear Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Chief Executive's Solicitation of Cooperation in Nuclear Racket against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive was very busy with foreign junkets between November 14 and 23 to take part in international meetings including the Group of 20 summit, regional summit and Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit. She talked nonsense that she expected the "north to give up its nuclear program and opt for opening and cooperation" and "it is necessary to pressurize the north to make a strategic decision to abandon its nuclear program and take the road of changes." 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean chief executive's foreign tours were mean mendicant ones and disgusting ones for confrontation as they were aimed to boost cooperation with foreign forces in the nuclear racket against the DPRK, while justifying the "north policy" of south Korea, and thus carry out her scenario to force the north "to abandon its nuclear program first." 
					
					 She vociferated about "nuclear threat from the north" and the "north's abandonment of its nuclear program" before outside forces. This was nothing but behavior of the shortsighted fool bereft of any elementary reason, the commentator says, and goes on:
					
					 Before crying out for the "north's abandonment of its nuclear program," the south Korean chief executive should reflect on the provocations the south Korean warmongers have perpetrated, escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula and danger of a nuclear war by zealously joining the U.S. in its nuclear threat to the DPRK. 
					
					 The more desperately she begs the outside forces for cooperation in the campaign to pressurize the DPRK, the more serious catastrophe the north-south relations will face and the further the confrontation and tension will escalate. 
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence is not a bargaining chip under any circumstances. 
					
					 It will further bolster up its nuclear deterrent and resolutely counter any hostile move to disable it as long as the U.S. pursues its hostile policy toward the DPRK and the danger of a nuclear war against it persists. 
					
					 The south Korean chief executive would be well advised to bear this in mind.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S.-Japan Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S.-Japan Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. staged large-scale naval joint military exercises with Japan with lots of ultra-modern warships including nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan involved.
					 The U.S. forces command in the Pacific described them as annual exercises for peace and stability but it is a trite trick to cover up their aggressive nature. 
					
					 The U.S. does not want peace and stability in Asia including the Korean Peninsula nor allow them.
					
					 It is because the U.S. strategy for world domination requires constant danger of a war and persistent instability in the region.
					
					 It is the calculation of the U.S. that only when the situation remains unstable in the region, is it possible to justify the presence of its huge aggression troops and military bases in different parts of the region and step up the formation of a military siege to the potential rivals under the pretext of "defending peace". 
					
					 That's why the U.S. keeps staging military exercises under various codenames on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity despite the worldwide rebuff and criticism.
					
					 When the north and the south were holding the reunion of separated families and relatives recently, the U.S. staged frantic anti-DPRK war exercises together with the south Korean military warmongers with nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan involved, chilling the atmosphere of the reunion and escalating the tension.
					
					 The recent joint military drills of the U.S. and Japan are premeditated saber-rattling to keep the situation in the region including the peninsula tense in a bid to secure a justification for political and military intervention and provide an opportunity of invasion.
					
					 An official of the U.S. Defence Department shortly ago blustered that "north Korea was the biggest threat to the U.S.-Japan security alliance." The U.S. forces command in the Pacific claimed that the recent exercises were aimed to jointly cope with the emergencies in the region. This proves that the drills were targeted against the DPRK and its neighbors.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal wantonly violating peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can decide the fate of the peninsula and the region through high-handed moves for igniting a war.
					
					 The U.S. brigandish acts of harassing peace are bound to be countered by strong measure for self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to take just measures for self-defence for safeguarding the sovereignty of the country and the peace and stability of the region from the U.S. war moves.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Warns of Stronger Resistance
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Warns of Stronger Resistance
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on November 25 charged that the present chief executive at a "state council meeting" on Nov. 24 labeled the November 14 all-out people's action as an illegal violent action and issued an instruction to strictly deal with the backstage forces. 
					 Even she revealed her intent to brand the participants in the action as a terrorist group, it said, and went on:
					
					 This is the threat to the forces opposing the stand of the "government" and the second all-out people's action to be staged on December 5. 
					
					 Her reckless remarks are sophism that the suppression of the November 14 action was just and that there is no reason for apologizing to the peasant who was put in a critical condition by riot police. 
					
					 The chief executive should understand the truth that "oppression would touch off stronger resistance."

articles.title: Ruling Party's Act of Submitting to Japan Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ruling Party's Act of Submitting to Japan Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea issued a statement on Nov. 18 in denunciation of the south Korean ruling party's submission to Japan in settling the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the ruling party's humiliating acts scuttled a "National Assembly" meeting for bringing a bill on setting a day of the victims of the sexual slavery for Imperial Japanese Army up for discussion on Nov. 17.
					
					 The institution of the day was proclaimed at an Asian solidarity meeting for settling the issue of the sexual slavery in reflection of the world determination to remember Japan's crimes related to the sexual slavery and pool efforts to prevent the recurrence of such crimes, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Every year not only Asian countries but also other countries around the world conduct information service and various other events through solidarity actions and give wide publicity to the institution of the day of the victims of sexual slavery for Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 However, the "Saenuri Party" opposed the issue of bringing the bill up for discussion at the assembly meeting, saying that such an act could spark off the diplomatic friction with Japan.
					
					 Despite of the disclosure of the fact that Japan has no will to fulfill its state and legal responsibilities for the sexual slavery, the ruling party is resorting to a traitorous act of scuttling the recent meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bangladeshi Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bangladeshi Newspaper
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi newspaper Daily Industry carried an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il is always alive" on Nov. 22.
					 The paper said:
					
					 The world lost the most prominent statesman as H.E. Kim Jong Il, leader of the DPRK, passed away on Dec. 17, 2011.
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Il was, indeed, the greatest man.
					
					 He was the outstanding thinker and theoretician who comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and great master of leadership who trained the Korean people as the most dignified and great people.
					
					 He was, at the same time, the peerlessly patriot who performed great exploits in the efforts to accomplish the cause of the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, the defender of justice and peace who made undying contributions to the global cause of independence and tender-hearted father who dedicated his all to the people's happiness all his life.
					
					 The world does not know such great man as Kim Jong Il who performed distinguished feats and dedicated his soul and energy to the people. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il will always be alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- A Venezuelan committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on November 20.
					 Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche idea, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce the sacred revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Jong Il and organize a national meeting on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed by Slovenian Body
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed by Slovenian Body
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il posted on its website an article titled "Invincibility of the WPK" on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his demise on Nov. 20.
					 The article said that the Workers' Party of Korea is the invincible party which has always emerged victorious, weathering the rigorous storm and stress of history over 70 years since its founding. It went on:
					
					 Its invincibility lies in its guiding idea, first of all.
					
					 The guiding idea of the WPK is Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism whose quintessence is the Juche idea, Songun idea.
					
					 The WPK is dynamically advancing the socialist cause without any slightest mistake or frustration or vacillation in implementing its line despite any upheaval of history as it is steadfastly remaining true to Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Its invincibility also lies in its steel-strong unity and cohesion.
					
					 The WPK turned into an invincible party under the leadership of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, successor to President Kim Il Sung's idea and cause.
					
					 The WPK remains invincible thanks to the people's absolute support and trust in it.
					
					 The WPK looks after the destiny of the people with responsibility.
					
					 There is in the DPRK an integrated whole of the leader, the Party and the people, something rare to be found elsewhere.
					
					 Its invincibility also lies in the fact that the DPRK is holding the outstanding leaders in high esteem, it added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Slovenia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Slovenia
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-Oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might" was posted by the Slovene committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il on its website on November 20.
					 The work, published on September 5, Juche 97 (2008), clarifies in detail that the invincible might of the DPRK lies in preserving and glorifying forever the Juche-oriented idea of President Kim Il Sung on nation-building and his exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fábrica de Zapatos de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fábrica de Zapatos de Wonsan
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejército Popular de Corea, dirigió sobre el terreno la Fábrica de Zapatos de Wonsan.
					   El Mariscal recorrió la sala de presentación del historial y la otra de educación en la historia revolucionaria acondicionada nuevamente.
					
					   Viendo con atención los datos alusivos a la trayectoria de la fábrica, el Mariscal dijo que en la fábrica está impregnado el sublime amor por el pueblo dispensado por el Presiente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quienes dedicaron toda su vida para el pueblo tomando como su lema el ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como cielo).
					
					   Puesto que se han acondicionado bien las salas mencionadas, se necesita realizar de diferentes formas y métodos la educación eficiente entre los empleados de la fábrica para que éstos cumplan mejor las misiones encargadas con el orgullo y dignidad de trabajar en la fábrica donde están grabadas las huellas de dirección de los grandes Líderes.
					
					   Pasó revista a la sala de diseños, la brigada de calzados moldeados, el taller de empella, el otro de fabricación de calzados y otros lugares enterándose en detalles de la producción y la calidad de los productos.
					
					   Dijo que la fábrica produce los zapatos con el cloruro de vinilo y el cuero sintético del Complejo de Vinalón "8 de Febrero" y la Fábrica de Cuero Sintético de Phyongsong y se mostró contento con los zapatos hechos con materiales nacionales.
					
					   Los zapatos elaborados por la fábrica son ligeros y tienen tipos distintos y bonitos, señaló y elogió que la fábrica logró éxitos en la materialización de orientación del partido en materia de realizar la diversificación, multicolorización y el aligeramiento y asegurar la solidez.
					
					   Recalcó que la fábrica tiene que esforzarse por producir mucho más y mejor los calzados convenientes a los gustos, los sentimientos estéticos, las constituciones físicas y las características psicológicas por edades del pueblo y a las estaciones.
					
					   Aseveró que está muy complacido recorriendo la Fábrica de Zapatos de Wonsan que registra sin cesar las innovaciones y el progreso y señaló que el Dirigente deseaba durante su vida poner en pleno funcionamiento las fábricas vinculadas con la mejora de vida del pueblo para que éste se beneficiara de ellas.
					
					   Subrayó que los funcionarios y empleados de la fábrica logran éxitos en la producción y la administración de la fábrica, como unidad dirigida por el partido y precursores de la modernización de la rama de industria ligera y señaló que todas las fábricas y empresas deben seguir el estilo y modo de trabajo de ellos.
					
					   El Mariscal dispensó a los empleados de la fábrica grandes beneficios que se transmitirán generación tras generación.
					
					   Le acompañaron Jo Yong Won y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Efectuado contacto de trabajo para conversaciones de autoridades N-S
articles.content:
Efectuado contacto de trabajo para conversaciones de autoridades N-S
Phanmunjom, 27 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el día 26 en el Pabellón Thong-il de la parte Norte de Phanmunjom el contacto de trabajo para las conversaciones de las autoridades del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					   En la ocasión ambas partes consultaron con sinceridad los problemas de trabajo que se presentan en sostener las conversaciones de autoridades Norte-Sur y publicaron una información conjunta.
					
					   El Norte y el Sur acordaron abrir el 11 de diciembre en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong las primeras conversaciones de las autoridades Norte-Sur y consultar los problemas inmediatos para la mejora de relaciones íntercoreanas.

articles.title: CRPP condena disparates de autoridades surcoreanas y prensa conservadora
articles.content:
CRPP condena disparates de autoridades surcoreanas y prensa conservadora
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La agencia surcoreana Yonhap News acuso el dia 25 a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de "politica de terror" y "politica dictatorial" transmitiendo el contenido de un documento publicado previamente en visperas de una supuesta "conferencia academica" del "instituto de la estrategia de seguridad estatal".
					El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP), en su declaracion fechada 27, lo califica de un intolerable insulto a la suprema dignidad de la RPDC y la grave provocacion politica encaminada a llevar al fracaso las relaciones intercoreanas y continua:
					
					Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que esta informacion se transmite abiertamente bajo el abierto amparo trasero de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Los contenidos reportados por Yonhap News fueron ofrecidos directamente por el Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea y el "instituto de la estrategia de seguridad estatal", que lo invento a base de los datos falsificados, es el nido de conspiradores subordinado a ese organo de inteligencia.
					
					La reciente accion imprudente de las autoridades surcoreanas, perpetrada en visperas del contacto de trabajo para las conversaciones de las autoridades de ambas partes coreanas, comprueba que ellas no tienen ninguna voluntad de resolver las relaciones intercoreanas mediante el dialogo.
					
					Los hechos demuestran claramente que las autoridades surcoreanas hablan del dialogo como si tuvieran interes en el, pero solamente abrigan la malsana intencion de enfrentar con la RPDC.
					
					Expresamos claramente nuestra posicion y voluntad de que sera imposible solucionar ni un problema con quienes se desesperan para difamar nuestra suprema dignidad.

articles.title: Efectuada conferencia de presidentes ejemplares de organizaciones de base de FGSC
articles.content:
Efectuada conferencia de presidentes ejemplares de organizaciones de base de FGSC
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 27 en esta capital la IV conferencia nacional de los presidentes ejemplares de las organizaciones de base de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) 
					En el presente conclave efectuado con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la FGSC, analizaron e hicieron balance los exitos y experiencias logrados en los dias pasados en los labores de las organizaciones de base de la FGSC y discutieron las tareas y los remedios para consolidar mas firmemente la federacion como organizacion combativa de defensa a ultranza al lider infinitamente fiel a la idea y la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Ri Il Hwan, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios de la rama interesada, los presidentes de las organizaciones de base de la FGSC, los funcionarios de la FGSC en el centro y las localidades
					
					En su informe de la ocasion, Ju Yong Gil, presidente del CC de la FGSC, dijo que durante todo el tiempo de la direccion sobre la revolucion los generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il concedieron la gran significacion al fortalecimiento de las organizaciones de base de la FGSC y dirigieron sabiamente los trabajos para elevar su funcion y papel, y prosiguio:
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien preparo en las llamaradas de la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa las preciosas tradiciones de la construccion de la organizacion politica masiva de la clase obrera, fundo el 30 de noviembre del 34 (1945) de la Era Juche la FGSC y establecio desde el centro hasta las organizaciones de base el ordenado sistema de labor.
					
					En el periodo cuando desplegaba las actividades revolucionarias entre los obreros de la Fabrica de Trolebus de Pyongyang y la Fabrica de Maquinas Textiles de Pyongyang, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il aclaro la mision principal de las organizaciones de base de la FGSC.
					
					Gracias a la sabia direccion del Mariscal, la autoctona idea y las hazanas de los generalisimos sobre la construccion de la federacion sindical se heredan brillantemente en la nueva etapa mas alta.
					
					El informante exhorto a todas las organizaciones de base y los miembros de la FGSC enaltecer para siempre al Presidente y al Dirigente como el sol del Juche y sostener con fidelidad la orientacion del Mariscal.
					
					Hubo intervenciones en la ocasion.
					
					Los intervencionistas dieron enfasis en la necesidad de  consolidar mas las organizaciones de base de la FGSC para hacer que todos sus integrantes se levanten con dinamismo a la ofensiva general por acoger el VII Congreso del PTC con el elevado entusiasmo politico y los exitos laborales sin precedentes.
